```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> from scipy.special import struve
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
>>> struve(1, 2.)
0.6467637282835622 
```

```py
>>> fig, ax = plt.subplots()
>>> x = np.linspace(-10., 10., 1000)
>>> for i in range(4):
...     ax.plot(x, struve(i, x), label=f'$H_{i!r}$')
>>> ax.legend(ncol=2)
>>> ax.set_xlim(-10, 10)
>>> ax.set_title(r"Struve functions $H_{\nu}$")
>>> plt.show() 
```
